articles.title: Lenovo unveils AI-powered ThinkPad X1 Carbon, ThinkPad X1, IdeaPad Pro 5i laptops at CES 2024 - HT Tech
articles.description: Lenovo's latest laptops lineup, featuring Intel Evo technology, promises an AI revolution with enhanced productivity and accessibility. These include Lenovo unveils AI-powered ThinkPad X1 Carbon, ThinkPad X1, and IdeaPad Pro 5i laptops.

articles.title: Google moves to end geofence warrants, a surveillance problem it largely created - TechCrunch
articles.description: The practice of law enforcement tapping Google and other tech giants' banks of users' location data was first revealed in 2019.
articles.content: Google will soon allow users to store their location data on their devices rather than on Google’s servers, effectively ending a long-running surveillance practice that allowed police and law enforce… [+5232 chars]
